column3:
Johnny wakes up early this morning. He is so happy. Today Daddy is taking him to the
ewlineaquarium. Johnny wants to see blue fish, red fish, yellow fish, and green fish. He also
ewlinewants to see really big fish.
ewline
ewlineDaddy and Johnny are at the aquarium. 
ewline
ewline"Look!" Johnny says. "There's a big red fish!" The fish swims away. A small yellow fish
ewlineswims up to the glass and looks at Johnny. 
ewline
ewline"A yellow fish!" says Johnny, "He's tiny."
ewline
ewlineLots of blue fish swim by behind the yellow fish. 
ewline
ewline"Look at all of those blue fish!" says Johnny. "They stay together."
ewline
ewlineDaddy points at a long fish and says "That one is as big as me!" 
ewline
ewlineJohnny laughs. He still wants to find a green fish. He sees a lot of fish, but none of
ewlinethem are green.
ewline
ewline"Daddy, I can't find a green fish. I want to see a green fish." 
ewline
ewlineDaddy laughs. "Let's go to the next window and look."
ewline
ewlineJohnny looks through the next window and sees lots of fish, but none of them are green
ewlinefish.
ewline
ewline"I still don't see any green fish," says Johnny. 
ewline
ewline"Look there," Daddy tells him. Johnny sees a green sea turtle! It's a lot bigger than a
ewlinefish.
ewline
ewlineAfter looking at all the fish, Daddy and Johnny go home again.
column9: one: What color was the sea turtle?
column14: one: Where did Johnny and Daddy go?
column19: multiple: Which fish did Johnny see first?
